prostejov.name: Prostějov
prostejov.summary: Prostějov is known as the city of fashion and home to the beautiful Art Nouveau town hall. The surroundings offer the scenic Plumlov dam with its unique castle.

otrokovice.name: Otrokovice
otrokovice.summary: An industrial heart with unique Baťa architecture. Located at the confluence of the Morava and Dřevnice rivers, it is a key point on the historic Baťa Canal.

zlin.name: Zlín
zlin.summary: The world-famous city of Tomáš Baťa. Architecture enthusiasts will love the functionalist "21" skyscraper and the unique shoe-making museum.
